description:
Top Crazy Games is bringing you +777-, the Lucky Pirates Gold Treasure Casino Slots game

Play this pirate themed style slot machine with Blackjack and Bonus Prize Wheel on your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch.

Also, double down your credits on the awesome Blackjack table. Daily bonus spins to win free credits and awesome prizes. Play everyday to get a chance to win!

+777-, the Lucky Pirates Gold Treasure Casino Slots game is a slot simulator for entertainment use only. It is free to play, and you can choose to purchase an unlock payout with in-app transactions.
